column4: i installed 8.10.. i have problems getting my wifi card working. its a old broadcom uses chit 4306 i think. on a older kernel i used to have the bcm43xx driver installed. but now it seams want b43leagcy. i installed firmware. but it will not connect to any networks. anyideas?
I think you want b43 ( the new driver)
yes, just try, rmmod old one, and modprobe new one
